name: Bull in a China Shop (milk9111, ReaperGrim)
name_original: Bull in a China Shop (milk9111, ReaperGrim)
description:
Just a bull in a china shop, trying to avoid the chaos of a running business. Will the bull get out of the shop in time.  OR WILL TIME CATCH HIM!!!

The goal is to reach the EXIT on the level. You can only move in a single direction for the entirety of the lane. So if you go UP and there are 3 intersections, the bull will skip all of those until it reaches the end of the lane. 

You reach the end when you hit it straight on.


The controls are (w,a,s,d)-(arrow keys)

Credits and a tutorial can be accessible in the main menu/title screen.
